A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What you get if you take a Non-Star War's fan and make Star Wars movie? This is trash and feels like a big \"F-U\" to all fans. This needs to be deleted. This movie goes out of its way to be a stand-a-lone film when it's supposed to be part of a trilogy. For the life of me I don't get the reasoning here. This movies destroys the character development of nearly all cast members from what TFA established. WHY?!? This honestly feels like Rain Johnson never watched a SW film before or know anything about the world of Starwars.
